lexUnit.name: shape.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the external form or appearance of someone or something; the outline of an area or figure.

sentence.text: They used to cut it up and pretend to eat it and would cut out all different kinds of shapes .
For even more variety , try weaving several different sizes of the chosen shape , or even combining two or three different shapes into the same design .
A dark , hanging shape blocked the way .
As she was about to pass the dark shape , something seemed to attach her skirt to the ground , and she had to stop .
The light , as it grew , began to show the upper field , while the distant hedge and brook remained dark , linear shapes below .
The three basic camcorder shapes are shown in these typical examples ( two here , one shown overleaf ) .
Delgard glanced once more at the door before following the dark shape down the corridor .
Once the two basic shapes have been created a single point is selected on each object using the blend tool and the program then creates the required number of ` in-between " stages .
My starting point as always in recording such scenes , is a simple pen sketch , establishing the basic shapes and structures .
The values of each of the exponents vary independently of the other , to produce half-life curves of markedly different shapes .
The dark shape of a ` ring-tail " rises from cover .
He stared towards the point where the light had been , wanting to see a darker shape on darkness .
Even then it was difficult to be sure which of the shadowy tumbled shapes was the one in which Marian had dropped the sack .
Salvation , finally , appeared out of the blue one night in the shape of up-and-coming young trainer Nigel Twiston-Davies .
This improvement became available only a couple of years ago in the shape of Gore-Tex booties .
A relaxation of the ligaments in your spine combined with the effect of your changing shape on your posture can give rise to backache .
As she grappled with the staples she could feel inside the bag the firm shape of a book .

When creating a stencil design , it is essential to remember to leave a space between each leaf or flower shape , otherwise the stencil card will drop to pieces when it is cut out .
A long-tailed , hawk-like bird emerged from the trees , dusky shape in the gloom .
The assessments made by the defence staff establish the right shape for our defences for the 1990s .
Mr Adamec cited pressure from the opposition in bargaining over the shape of a new government as his reason for stepping down .
